title: In a previous posting in regards to the Middle Sound paving project it stated that the paving would be done by Dec 15th, 2010. Well it\'s January 2011 and I have yet to see the first bit of work. When is a realistic date to begin and finish the work AND will there be better quality control than was done with the sewer project?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=9361
